text: mage janayini, sæbævin ma numbala vasu pætava (næmaduma ta) gænimen mahat aparadhayak kalehu ya. ebævin numbala numbala ge utpadakaya veta pascattapa vi yomu vanu. enam numbala (simava ikmavuvanva) numbalama ghatanaya karanu. eya numbala ge utpadakaya abiyasa numbala ta srestha veyi. evita ohu numbala ta samava deyi. sæbævin ma ohu pascattapaya piliganna ya. asimita karunavantaya ya yæyi musa tama janaya ta pævasu avasthava sihipat karanu
